This is ridiculous...if you haven't realized it by now (doubtful with all the Portland weirdos). Frankly, part of me thinks you idiots deserve despair. But the better part of me knows better. I have made a plead with to be the media hero in this story to report the absolute truth. You all are being fed a pack of lies...including facts by omission. These people are far from terrorists...quite the contrary. Wake the hell up and learn the truth...instead of listenting to the lamestream media directed at your sympathies. Geez...I'm really tired of trying to get the message across...but here's the latest that includes FBI interteraction...in long detail. Bother to learn...or bury your head.

10209708626733621 so if you are grabbed from behind and don't know who it is you won't swing? Again, dunno if that's what happened but that's the rumors. We do not know if this woman attacked him from behind. How about we wait to hear this guys side of the story instead of only a fraction of the story? """"Normal people don't act out in a violent way like petulant children."""" Normal people wouldn't attack someone without knowing they would get attacked in return. If a woman physically attacks a man in any way he has every right to defend himself how he feels is necessary. Oh and by lumping trump supporters into a category of deplorable makes you one of Hillary's deplorable supporters.

No jobs. Record high on food stamps. Insurance cancelled for millions. People dying because OBAMACARE does not cover medicine they need. Gas prices have zero to do with OBAMA.... Or least liberals use to say presidents have nothing to do with gas prices . The stock market? Sure great... Printing billions will do that... Ask the people in the unemployment and food stamp lines how impressed they are with the stock market. 2500$ loss to median income. Middle class disappearing. The rich getting richer and the poor getting poorer. Yes thanks OBAMA.

The issue is not WHO is running. The issue is are WE going to become and remain vigilant citizens who prioritize our politics and culture and rights, over television and instant gratification? It's up to us, why aren't you doing articles on voting and the lack there of, and the low numbers that turn out? Why aren't you doing stories on the need to be involved all the time, and to demand accountability from all elected officials?
